item.title: Authorization Runtime/Decision API
item.description: window.onload = function() { var url = "\/swagger\/policy-check.yaml"; const ui = SwaggerUIBundle({ url: url, dom_id: '#swagger-ui', deepLinking: true, presets: [ SwaggerUIBundle.presets.apis, SwaggerUIStandalonePreset ], plugins: [ SwaggerUIBundle.plugins.DownloadUrl ], layout: "StandaloneLayout" }) window.ui = ui }
